resources.string: The birthday party will take place on:

Saturday 19th May 
Two Thousand Eighteen 
Five O'Clock in the afternoon
The birthday party will be at:

Red Cow 
296High Street 
Smethwick, Birmingham B66 3NL 
England 

(If you need directions just click on the directions widget on the bottom right or the button below).
At the event you will be provided with:

Starters at Six O'Clock 
Mains will be distributed at Eight O'Clock 
Dessert will be served at Nine O'Clock 

There will also be music, and a dance floor,so you can bust out your dance moves. 
Don't worry about bringing money for drinks because there will be an open bar!
If you can attend please R.S.V.P as soon as possible, click on the R.S.V.P widget for more details. Or you can click on the R.S.V.P button below.

If you don\'t enter a place in the field below and press the directions button the map will display the location of the party. If you would like the directions to the party, just simply enter the place you would like directions from, and click on directions.

Please send me an email by May 1st clarifying whether you are able to attend. You can do this by filling out the information below and pressing send, which will open up the email for you. If you have any more requirements you can include it in this email.

If you don\'t enter a place in the field below and press the directions button the map will display the location of the party. If you would like the directions to the party, just simply enter the place you would like directions from, and click on directions. If you would like to stay on this app, and just see where the party is simply click on current location.
How to R.S.V.P for the party!
Will you be bring a plus one?>
Please informs of on any dietary requirements below
If there are any other requirements please say below

If you would like the directions to the party, just simply enter the place you would like directions from, and click on directions. If you would like to stay on this app, and just see where the party is simply click on party location.
